A bill to amend the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to support religious freedom in foreign countries.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Amends the International Religious Freedom Act of 1998 to revise presidential requirements, including reporting requirements, with respect to the designation of a country as a country of particular concern for religious freedom.
